eas_text: A civil authority has issued AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE for the following counties or areas: Maricopa, AZ; at 12:25 PM ON DEC 22, 2025 Effective until 08:25 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
A SAFE Alert has been issued for Phoenix, Arizona. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. Phoenix Police Department has requested a Safe Alert for 70-year-old Raul Perez. He is described as five feet two inches tall, 170 pounds with brown eyes and white hair. Raul was last seen on Monday 12/15/2025 in the area of 62nd Avenue and Vineyard Road. Raul was wearing an orange T-shirt, dark jeans, with a brown or green jacket. He suffers from a medical condition which may cause him to become confused and easily lost. Please contact the Phoenix Police Department with any information on Raul.
If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
